QuestData.Title: The Iron Wolf
QuestData.Description: My brother Ga'nar stands beside me.$B$BWor'gol, Stonefang, and your garrison hold strong.$B$BOur clan is united, and the Thunderlord are already on the run. We are ready. The time has come to face this "Iron Wolf."
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter the Hunter's Hall in Grom'gar and defeat the Iron Wolf.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for protecting my family, $p.
